parameters.name: Field
parameters.description: Field used for whitelist in sensitive file alerts.

parameters.name: FieldValue
parameters.description: Expected value of the field to be whitelisted.

parameters.name: Operator
parameters.description:
Rule judgment operator:
- strEqual: String equals

parameters.name: TargetType
parameters.description:
Effective target type:
- ALL: All assets
- SELECTION_KEY: Assets selected via the asset selection component

parameters.name: TargetValue
parameters.description:
Target effective scope:
- ALL: All assets
- Other: Key of the asset range selected by the asset selection component
